• {{user.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { switchMap } from 'rxjs/operators'; import { IUser, UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.scss'], }) export class ListComponent { // users: IUser[] = []; // ! 1st way to get the users // users$ = this.userService.users$; // ! 2nd way to get the users --> get them from the service users: IUser[] = []; // ! 3rd way to get the users --> get from the route data constructor(private userService: UserService, private route: ActivatedRoute) { // ! 1st way to load the users // this.route.queryParams.pipe( // switchMap(qp => { // const filterName = qp['filter']; // return this.userService.loadUsers(filterName ? { name: filterName } : undefined) // }) // ).subscribe(users => { // this.users = users; // }); // ! 3rd way to get the users this.users = this.route.snapshot.data['users']; } }
